comment.author: 45586426@N06
comment._content: Copy of damaged picture of a Douglas AD-6 / A-1H Skyraider 13972? in Light Gull Gray and Insignia White scheme. Tail code NH of Carrier Air Wing Eleven (CVW-11) USS KITTY HAWK above NAVY and VA-115 below Modex 501 on engine cowl. Small squadron emblem on upper rear fuselage. There is evidence of information about picture revealing itself from reverse side……… Information taken from 'GO!NAVY' internet website, courtesy of Takafumi Hiroe, citizen of Japan and naval aviation historian: www.gonavy.jp/index.html www.gonavy.jp/CVW-NHf.html VA-115 ‘Arabs’ was assigned to CVG-11 /CVW-11 aboard CVA-63 USS Kitty Hawk from at least 1961 to 1966. The full Navy serial number may be interpreted as Bu No 139726 from about 1965 when with VA-115. There is an internet record dated 5 Sept 1964 that A-1H Skyraider 139726 was ‘Written Off’ (circumstances or reasons as yet unknown): aviation-safety.net/wikibase/wiki.php?id=69769 Representative period pictures of VA-115 ‘Arabs’ A-1H Skyraiders: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:A-1H_VA-115_CVA-63_1966.jpg skyraider.org/skyassn/memberpics/tabrum/tabrum.htm
